<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Triton's Conch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=269)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 576 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 640 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

If you put this large opalescent conch shell to your ear, you can hear the sound of the roaring sea crashing against the shore.

<document level="2" id="action-177" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Triton's Conch
